positive_examples: This is an example of demigod.
We observed demigod in this context.
A typical case of demigod would involve these features.
The concept of demigod applies here.
A divine being with partial godlike status, often born from union of deity and mortal.
negative_examples: This is an example of angel, not demigod.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: Angel, or other types of Deity

definition: A being with partial divine ancestry or status between mortal and deity.
